subproject.description: The budget revision has been prepared to reflect an adjustment to IUCN's annual work plans, as agreed in the Project Board meeting in June 2011. Following a request by IUCN, the Project Board approved the movement of $65,000 from vulnerability studies to national strategy development within the IUCN project ($45,000 from 2011 and $20,000 from 2012). As a result, all funds from Activity 6 (for both 2011 and 2012) have now been reallocated to Activity 3, to be implemented in 2011. In addition, $1,000 under Activity 8 (implementation fee) was shifted from 2012 to 2011.
subproject.gender code: Gender Equality as a principal objective
subproject.title: Mainstreaming gender in CCI

subproject.corporate outcome: Inclusive growth and social equity promoted through pro-poor macroeconomic and fiscal policies that support income, employment and social protection of  youth, women and vulnerable groups in a sustainable way

title: Mainstreaming gender in climate change intiatives
